channel.description: Atom Discontinued This video uses the Atom text editor, which was discontinued by GitHub. We now recommend using Visual Studio Code instead. The text below has been updated, but the video has not. Installing and using Visual Studio Code should be very similar to what is shown here. YouTube Video In this lab, we’re going to cover various ways to install Python on your computer. First, we’ll cover the basic way to install Python on a Windows system.
